DOC.brief_summary: The steep Trendelenburg position pneumoperitoneum laparoscopic surgery potential cause increase intracranial pressure ( ICP ) . Previous study propose ultrasonographic measurement optic nerve sheath diameter ( ONSD ) correlate sign increase ICP . Therefore , study aim confirm increase ICP ultrasonographic measurement ONSD laparoscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Pneumoperitoneum Trendelenburg Position Intracranial Pressure : Ultrasonographic Measurement Optic Nerve Sheath Diameter
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( 2090 year age ) schedule undergoing robotassisted laparoscopic prostatectomy undergo general anesthesia Patients previous history neurologic disease , carotid disease , transient ischemic attack , ocular disease ocular surgery
